frontmatter.title: Promise.allSettled
frontmatter.description: Promise.allSettled returns a promise when all inputs are settled that is either fulfilled or rejected.

frontmatter.title: Custom Spread Operator [...5]
frontmatter.description: The spread operator is denoted by 3 dots. Basically it takes an iterator and can do copy or expand or concat or merge.

frontmatter.title: Promise.all
frontmatter.description: Say we want many promises to execute in parallel and wait until all of them are resolved. Then Promise.all() is our candidate.
